post.title: Welcome to your new blog
post.content:
🌱 Welcome to Your New Blog!

MiniBlog.Core represents the evolution of MiniBlog, a pioneering minimal blog engine launched in 2013 by Mads Kristensen. Its commitment remains unchanged: delivering an exceptional blogging experience through minimalist design and optimized performance.

Modern Features:

  • Seamless social media integration for broader reach
  • Built-in comment system for community engagement
  • SEO-optimized structure for better visibility
  • Comprehensive RSS/ATOM feed support
  • Cross-platform compatibility (Windows, Mac, Linux)
  • Mobile-first responsive design
  • Advanced content editor support (Live Writer, Markdown Monster)
  • Web Developer Checklist compliance

Security & Standards Built on modern web standards, MiniBlog.Core includes robust security features and follows best practices for web development. It's regularly updated to maintain compatibility with the latest browser technologies and security requirements.

Developer-Friendly For developers, MiniBlog.Core offers a clean, well-documented codebase that's easy to customize and extend. Whether you're looking to add new features or modify existing ones, the platform's architecture makes it straightforward to implement your changes.

Getting Started Your blog is now ready for content! Start by customizing your settings and creating your first post. If you need assistance, our documentation and community resources are available to help you make the most of MiniBlog.Core's features.

Special formatting

Pre-formatted text such as what is commonly used to display code syntax is styled beautifully.

function code() {
        var msg = "This is what a code snippet looks like";
        }

And tables are formatted nicely with headings and alternative background color for rows.

And tables look rally nice too
Numbers 2 3 4 5
Alphabet b c d e
Symbols ? $ * %

Enjoy!
